channel.title: zhaoningsheng on Ningsheng Zhao
channel.description: Recent content in zhaoningsheng on Ningsheng Zhao

item.description: Ningsheng Zhao I am a PhD student in Information & Systems Engineering at Concordia University. I am supervised by Professor Jiayuan Yu. My research interest lies in Machine Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Graphical models and Statistical Modelling. I have a passion for building new models and algorithms. In the past one year, I was focusing on the research in a brand new bootstrap kernel mixture model for unsupervised learning, and an upgraded tree Boosting Monte Carlo algorithm for reinforcement learning.
